objects.specification: A seamless floor surface with an earthy natural color resembling light beige stone or muted terracotta, featuring a subtle matte texture covering the entire classroom footprint.
A flat wall painted in an earthy neutral warm beige tone; smooth plaster surface with no trim.
A flat wall painted in an earthy neutral warm beige tone; smooth plaster surface with no trim.
A flat wall painted in an earthy neutral warm beige tone; smooth plaster surface with no trim.
A flat wall painted in an earthy neutral warm beige tone; smooth plaster surface with no trim.
A flat white ceiling with matte finish, designed to integrate recessed ceiling lights evenly spaced; the surface is seamless and unadorned.

A student desk designed as a rectangular table with a smooth light wood finish, featuring rounded edges and minimalist modern design; the tabletop surface is flat and lightly textured to resemble natural oak, supported by slender tapered legs in the same light wood tone; the overall style is simple and functional, with clean lines and a clear knee clearance underneath.

children.specification: A student chair with a supportive backrest and seat upholstered in a complementary muted color fabric, mounted on a wooden frame matching the desk's light wood tone; the chair has slightly angled legs and a contoured seat for ergonomic comfort.

objects.specification: A large teacher's desk with a dark wood finish, featuring a spacious rectangular tabletop with gently rounded corners and a subtly textured surface to evoke walnut wood; the desk is supported by robust squared legs and includes a modesty panel across the front; the style blends classic and professional aesthetic.

children.specification: A teacher's office chair with a padded seat and backrest upholstered in a complementary muted tone, mounted on a sturdy wooden swivel base matching the desk's dark wood finish; the chair features armrests and a slightly reclined back for comfort, with subtle decorative stitching.

objects.specification: A large rectangular blackboard with a dark matte writing surface framed by a slim metal frame; the board includes a subtle chalk ledge at the bottom for chalk storage.

A detailed dinosaur skeleton model with realistically fossilized bone texture in off-white and light beige tones; the skeleton is mounted on a minimal supporting stand, evoking a museum exhibit style.

A tall bookshelf with multiple open shelves in natural wood finish; the shelves are filled with dinosaur-themed books and small fossil replica models; the design is sturdy with simple rectangular frame and vertical supports.
A circular wall clock with a simple white face, black hour markings, and slender black hands; the frame is a thin metallic ring in a muted steel color.
A decorative potted plant with lush green foliage in a ceramic planter with earthy glaze; the plant leaves are broad and glossy, adding natural ambiance.
A large rectangular window with clear glass panes set in a slim frame to allow abundant natural light.
Curtains made of light beige fabric with soft drape, hanging from a slim curtain rod; the fabric has a subtle textural weave.
A simple cylindrical waste bin made of matte gray plastic with a slightly tapered profile and open top.
A simple cylindrical waste bin made of matte gray plastic with a slightly tapered profile and open top.
A dinosaur-themed educational poster printed on matte paper, featuring vivid illustrations of prehistoric creatures and labeled diagrams.
